text: wananthara padaka kotagath hondama sinamapata
thorathuru dana ganime panatha idiripath kirima saha madhya nidahasa thahawuru kirima.

eewa, awasana satan sidu wu bime pawa pawathwuni.

mama hayiyen dakunu kakula bima gahala gamma gaththa.
wideshayakin koti 15k ekawara damala..

ee nisama aatha athithaye indalama api aahara athin swayanposhitha ratak hatiyata thaba ganna kriya kala.ee wagema ada lokaye athi wela thibena thaththwayath, idiriyata athi wana thaththwayath uda aahara surakshithathawa raka ganna me aya wayenuth wishesha awadhanayak yomu karala thibenawa.

ninde sitina punchi daruwa bera gath balu patawa ‚Äì
mehi di ee pilibanda dharma karunu samaga sansandanaya kere.

nithiyen nisi sadharanaya ishta wenathuru balan innawa wina wena kala haki yamak me welawe mata nathi bawa hondinama watahuna unath, hithe kakarena kalakirima, tharahawa ekka mage hitha thula goda naguna paliganime chethanawa iwak bawak nathiwama liyala waduna.
kiyala thamayi matath hithune
(mama adatath mage samahara yaluwo gana duk wenawa un igenima kadakappal karagena ada wela thiyena de dakkama).

loka nayakayo balapam karannata patangena atha.
api katayuthu karanne nithiye ramuwata anuwayi.

hama deyakma hoya bala pawarim kirimen gatalu sahitha thaththwayak athiwenne naha.pawarumakadi api parana lipigonu pilibanda wishesha awadhanaya yomu karanawa.2011 di pera nowu wiru aakarayaka aadayamak api athpath karagaththa.

palamu shreniyata lamayin 1 th 5 th athara pramanayak athulu wana pasal 1077 k athi athara prathishathayak lesa lamayin 9 ta adu gananak palamu shreniyata athulath wu pasal sankhyawa siyayata 25 ki.me siyalu pasal wasi yame tharjanayata lakwa athath adhyapana amathyanshaya wisin aarambha karana lada dwithiyika pasal dahasa nanga situwime wadasatahana mangin ema¬† anathura walakwa gatha haki yayi adhyapana amathi bandula gunawardhana mahatha pawasayi.me anuwa pasal 1096 ka pramanayak anga sampurna dwithiyika pasal lesa godanangimata kabinat mandalaye anumathiya labi atha. 2012 wasare sita kriyathmaka wimata niyamitha me wadasatahana yatathe ansha pahakin me pasal godananwimata niyamitha baw adhyapana amathiwaraya pawasayi.karthruta liyanna | mudranaya sandaha
sarasawi sisun wisin kriyathmaka kala wirodhatha wyaparayak adhi pidana jala ha kadulu gas praharayak ella kara wisuruwa hara thibenawa.

maha pola ape gamatath sendu wela.....mathaka widihata dedahas hathare awurudde...yantham usas pela kala witharayi..maha pola balanna yannath athe salli thiyenna epayi..palaweni dawase horata ringuwa ..hamadama mehema karanna bari nisa tikat aranma yanna widihak kalpana kara kara hitiye..dukata sapata inna raniduwa langama hitiyath hamadama athe pichchiya naha..pichchiya thiya pichchiya danna sakkuwakwath minihata naha..

jawipe sahaya maithri athulu yu en pi pramukha podu wipakshayata laba dimata boho idakada athi bawata kanin konin aaranchi paminena witama mage mawa pawasuye ‚Äú88-89 marala dapu ahinsaka kollo mini wale indan sapa karanawa mun yu en pi ekata ekathu wunoth nam‚Äù kiyalayi.

harath, niwasata wathura jala prawahana mandalayen da, widuliya widulibala mandalayen da labenawa se, kunu kasala iwath kirime sewaya bharawa thibune nagara sabhawata ya.

kisidu aagamakata wiruddhawa satan karana sanwidhanayak nowa shasanaya aaraksha kirimata bihiwu balakayaki yannen prakashayaka satahanak thabamin arambai mema balakaye aramuna lesa sandahan kota thibuye; mini maranne na pata paksha na rata jathiya aagama wenuwen pana wuwath demi lesaya.

nawa soyaganima hethuwen lowata athwiya haki prayojana athara: balashakthiya sandaha wayawana wiyadama adukirima, hayidrajan lohaye balashakthiya thanpath kirima, indhanayak lesin bhawitha kirima abhyawakasha yana nishpadanaya sandaha hayidrajan lohaya yodaganima adhiwegi dumriya adu wiyadamakin nishpadanaya kirima ilektronika paripatha nipadawima sandaha yodaganima "udaharanayak widiyata widuliya sampreshanayedi prathirodhaya nisa loku haniyak wenawa.
rathawahana polis aaranchimarga walin warthawanne me thaththwaya hethuwen medinawala bimath riyaduran nithiye rahanata hasukara ganime meheyumwalata pramukhathawa labadima athhara athi bawayi.
kanadawe boho denek wunath ehemayi, lankawe tap wathurawala thathwayan nisa bhayanakakamak thibunath wenath ratawala behewin aduyi.

inpasuwa, sisun 1000 kata wadi sankhyawak bandawa ganimata haki wu athara, eyin adahas wanne pasugiya kalaya thula mema aayathanayen sama wasarakama thorathuru thakshana upadhidharin 1000 kata wadi sankhyawak bihi kara athi bawayi.

anika me pili udin kochchiya yanakota gassenawa aduyi.

oona tharam aalokaya, sulanga thibena apa wage rataka eewa karyakshama lesa bhawitha nokirimama aparadhayak.‚Äù‚Äúee wage ma supiri welendasal aashrithawa siduwana wishalathama kanagatudayaka winashaya thamayi polithin bag adhiparibhojanaya.aduma washayen ee aayathanawala thibena prathichakrikaranaya kalahaki malu pilibanda paribhogikayata mathak kirimakwath siduwanne naha.

manushya lokaye sapa duk mishra thaththwayak mathuwi penunath, apa jiwitha nirantharayenma wenaswana swabhawayata (anithya), ee nisama duk sahitha (dukkha) elesama thamata awashya aakarayata pawathwiya nohaki (anathma) swabhawayen yuktha bawa gambauren sithana kenekuta daka gatha hakiya.

ayi. pi. el. tharaga bime wenath kandayamak thama samaga nawa giwisumakata elambaenu athayi 2011 wasarata nawa banku apakarayak idiripath kirimata asamath wimen ayi. pi. el. tharagawaliya ahimi wu kochi taskars kandayamata krida kala muththayiya muralidaran prakasha kaleya.ayi. pi. el. tharagawaliye palamu wasara 3 di chennayi pilata krida kala muralidaran me wasare janawari masayedi kochi pila wisin milata ganu labiya.kochi kandayama wisin milata ganu labu kridakayan wenuwen me wasara sandaha banku apakaraya idiripath kirimata apohosath wime hethuwen ayi. pi. el. tharagawaliyen athahara damimata erata krikat palaka mandalaya piyawara gaththeya.
